Source.Name: ncdu
Source.Summary: Disk usage analyzer with ncurses interface
Source.Description: ncdu is a disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface, aimed to be run on a remote server over SSH. It is therefore designed to be fast, simple, and easy to use.
